Name: Bloomee
About the game: Bloomee offers a variety of intricately designed scenes that allow the users to relax, meditate and spend some time alone; all the while relish the experience of what it feels like to spend a night under the stars, walk through a cherry blossoms field and take a trip to a tropical island. The app aims to help users to nurture themselves and indulge in some self-care - all within the comforts of their own home. The game is a “pick-up-and-play” that utilizes the Oculus headset’s default control scheme along with graphical in-app instructions – allowing the users to experience the worlds that the app offers intuitively and seamlessly.
